full_description:
Hisense 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-18TW4RMATD01BU

The Hisense 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-18TW4RMATD01BU) has powerful cooling capabilities due to its 1.5-ton capacity and efficient DC inverter technology, making it appropriate for varied room sizes. Consistent performance is guaranteed when operating at a voltage of 220-240V and a frequency of 50Hz. With a CSPF rating and a cooling capability of 17998 Btu/h, it provides effective cooling while preserving energy efficiency. The dependable operation of the Hisense 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-18TW4RMATD01BU) is ensured by its sturdy GMCC rotary compressor. With a charge volume of 710g, its R32 refrigerant helps maintain the sustainability of the environment. With low mode setting noise levels down to 36 dB (A) indoors and 56 dB (A) outside, the equipment operates in an exceptionally quiet manner. The IPX4 protection guarantees robustness against external factors. With its LED front panel display, LCD wireless remote controller, and smart functionality for easy operation, the AC is equipped with cutting-edge technologies. Along with these useful features, it also has a removable and washable panel, a washable PP filter for simple maintenance, and a refrigerant leak detection system. Three-speed fan control, auto restart, and vertical and horizontal auto swing louvers allow the Hisense 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-18TW4RMATD01BU) to provide customized airflow. A 24-hour timer allows you to schedule comfort according to your preferences. Other functions include sleep operation and the super function for rapid cooling. A convenient and comfortable cooling solution for any space is offered by the Hisense 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-18TW4RMATD01BU), thanks to its extensive feature set and effective operation.

Hisense 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-22TW4RXBTD00BU)

The Hisense 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-22TW4RXBTD00BU) is designed to provide powerful cooling performance in bigger places, with a 2.0-ton cooling capacity and efficient DC inverter technology. Operating at 50Hz and 220-240 volts, it guarantees dependable operation. With a high EER of 3.14 and a cooling capacity of 21997 Btu/h, it provides effective cooling while using less energy. With a strong rotary compressor from GMCC, the Hisense 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-22TW4RXBTD00BU) guarantees dependability and longevity. It conforms to environmental regulations by using 950g of charge volume R32 refrigerant. When in low mode, the machine can work silently, producing interior noise levels as low as 36dB (A) and outdoor noise levels as low as 56dB (A). It is designed to endure environmental factors and has IPX4 protection. The LCD wireless remote controller, smart functionality for increased convenience, and an LED display on the front panel are examples of advanced features. It also includes useful features, including a 24-hour timer for scheduling comfort, a washable panel and filter, and the ability to detect refrigerant leaks. With its three-speed fan control, auto restart feature, and vertical and horizontal auto swing louvers, the Hisense 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-22TW4RXBTD00BU) provides adjustable airflow. A self-clean option for simple maintenance, a sleep mode for quick cooling, and a super function for quick cooling are additional features. Larger spaces may be reliably and conveniently cooled with the Hisense 2 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-22TW4RXBTD00BU), thanks to its extensive feature set and effective performance.

full_description:
Hisense 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-12TW4RYETD00BU)

The Hisense 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-12TW4RYETD00BU) provides effective and dependable cooling for spaces up to 1 ton. It has a cooling capacity of 12010 Btu/h and runs on a single-phase, 220-240V voltage with a 50Hz frequency. With a rated input of 1070W and a maximum input consumption of 1350W, the unit has a 3520W rated capacity. energy efficiency ratio (EER) of 3.29 is high, ensuring economical operation. R32 refrigerant is used in the Hisense 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-12TW4RYETD00BU). It has several features, such as auto restart, washable filters, 24-hour timer, LCD wireless remote control, and refrigerant leakage detection, for improved performance and convenience. The noise levels of its outside unit are 51 dB, while the indoor unit operates quietly at 28 dB (low) to 38 dB (high). Strong construction, IPX0/IPX4 degree of protection, and Class I/II electro protection characterize the Hisense 1 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type Full DC AS-12TW4RYETD00BU). For effective cooling, it has hydrophilic aluminum foil bridge fins, a rotary compressor, and a capillary expansion device. This Hisense air conditioner guarantees the best possible comfort and convenience for customers with its sleep mode, intelligent features, self-cleaning ability, and vertical and horizontal auto swing louvers.
